description:
All in one monitoring for Berachain.
This dashboard is designed to monitor the validator node of the Berachain.

panels.description: Number of validators who did not sign
panels.title: Missed validators

panels.description: Total size of the mempool in bytes.
panels.title: Mempool Size (Bytes)

panels.description: Number of block produced last minute
panels.title: Blocks per minute

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

panels.description: Amount of data read and written to the device per second
panels.title: Disk R/W Speeds /sec (raw devices)

panels.description: Time spent on each read/write operation
panels.title: Disk Latencies (raw devices)

panels.description: The number of read/write requests sent to the raw drives
panels.title: Disk Requests /sec (raw devices)

panels.description: If this is at 100%, it doesnt necessarily mean that the device is saturated. SSD and NVMe devices require multiple outstanding I/O requests to deliver their full throughput.
panels.title: Disk Utilization % (raw devices)

title: Berachain Validator Monitoring
